locales.plugin_description: Allow players to add maps to the "jukebox" so they can play favorites without waiting.
locales.slash_chat_list_description: Lists maps currently on the server (see: /list help)
locales.slash_chat_jukebox_description: Sets map to be played next (see: /jukebox help)
locales.slash_chat_add_description: Adds a map directly from MX (ID)
locales.slash_chat_y_description: Votes Yes for a MX map or chat-based vote
locales.slash_chat_history_description: Shows the 10 most recently played maps
locales.info_message1: Wondering which maps you have not played recently? Use "/list norecent" to find out!
locales.info_message2: Use "/list newest" to find the newest maps added to the server, then /jukebox them!
locales.info_message3: Use "/list" -> "/jukebox ##" to add a map in the jukebox.
locales.info_message4: Jukeboxed the wrong map? Use "/jukebox drop" to remove it!
locales.info_message5: Wondering what maps were played recently? Use the "/history" command.
locales.maps_na: {#server}» {#highlite}{#error} maps currently unavailable, try again later!
locales.error_erasing: {#server}» {#error}Error erasing old file. Please contact admin.
locales.error_saving: {#server}» {#error}Error saving file - unable to write data. Please contact admin.
locales.error_must_include: {#server}» {#error}You must include a MX map ID!
locales.tip: Use {#highlite}$i/add {1}{#error} or see {#highlite}$i/helpvote{#error} to start one.
locales.error_no_maps_mx: {#server}» {#error}No maps found, or MX is down!
locales.jukebox_next: {#server}» {#emotic}The next map will be {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} as requested by {#highlite}{2}
locales.list_help: {#server}» {#emotic}Use {#highlite}/list{#emotic} first - Type {#highlite}/list help{#emotic} for more info.
locales.jukebox_already: {#server}» {#emotic}You already have a map in the jukebox! Wait till it's been played before adding another.
locales.jukebox_dupl: {#server}» {#emotic}This map has already been added to the jukebox, pick another one.
locales.jukebox_repeat: {#server}» {#emotic}This map has been played recently. Wait a while before adding it again.
locales.jukebox: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} was added to the jukebox by {#highlite}{2}
locales.jukebox_notfound: {#server}» {#emotic}Map_ID not found - Type {#highlite}/list{#emotic} to see all maps.
locales.jukebox_empty: {#server}» {#emotic}No maps in the jukebox, use {#highlite}/elist{#emotic} to add one
locales.jukebox_nodrop: {#server}» {#emotic}You don't have a map in the jukebox, use {#highlite}/elist{#emotic} to add one
locales.jukebox_help: {#server}» {#emotic}You have to include a Map_ID, e.g {#highlite}/jukebox 12{#emotic} - Type {#highlite}/jukebox help{#emotic} for more info.
locales.no_jukebox: {#server}» {#highlite}/jukebox{#emotic} is not currently enabled on this server.
locales.vote_already: {#server}» {#error}A vote is already in progress. Wait for this to complete.
locales.map_too_large: {#server}» {#error}Map is too large ({#highlite}{1}$i{#error} > {2} KB) - not added!
locales.add_present: {#server}» {#highlite}Map already in server list, not added.
locales.jukebox_add: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} is requesting {#highlite}{2}{#emotic} from {3}.{4}{#emotic}This will require {#highlite}{5}{#emotic} votes to pass. Type {#highlite}/y{#emotic} to vote yes.
locales.no_add: {#server}» {#highlite}/add{#emotic} is not currently enabled on this server.
locales.jukebox_y: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} more votes needed to add {#highlite}{3}{#emotic}. Type {#highlite}/y{#emotic} to vote yes.
locales.jukebox_pass: {#server}» {#emotic}Vote Passed! {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} has been added to the jukebox.
locales.vote_y: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#vote} more vote{2} needed to {#highlite}{3}{#vote}. Type {#highlite}/y{#vote} to vote yes.
